section.description: Alpha Anywhere provides the following methods for modifying Field Rules using Xbasic. Use the <TBL>.RULES_GET() method to create the pointer.

case.title: Change_Begin()
case.description: Indicates that you are about to change the value of a field rule.

case.title: Change_End()
case.description: Indicates that you are finished changing the value of one or more field rules and want to save the changes.

case.title: Mode_Get()
case.description: Determines the current data entry mode of the pointer.
